00436       enum positions {
00437          upperLeftLat_POS  = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE,
00438          upperLeftLon_POS  = upperLeftLat_POS + 4,
00439          lowerRightLat_POS = upperLeftLon_POS + 4,
00440          lowerRightLon_POS = lowerRightLat_POS + 4,
00441          screenSizeX_POS   = lowerRightLon_POS + 4,
00442          screenSizeY_POS   = screenSizeX_POS + 2,
00443          maxScaleLevel_POS = screenSizeY_POS + 2,
00444          minScaleLevel_POS = maxScaleLevel_POS + 4,
00445          filtScaleLevel_POS= minScaleLevel_POS + 4,
00446          language_POS      = filtScaleLevel_POS + 4,
00447          startOffset_POS   = language_POS + 4,
00448          endOffset_POS     = startOffset_POS + 2,
00449          nbrColors_POS     = endOffset_POS + 2,
00450          isStartAndEnd_POS = nbrColors_POS + 1, // Also drawOverview and
00451                                                 // drawCountryPolygon
00452          nbrReqPackets_POS = isStartAndEnd_POS + 1,
00453          target_POS        = nbrReqPackets_POS + 1,
00454          nbrNodeIDs_POS    = target_POS + 1,
00455          mapSettingsLen_POS= nbrNodeIDs_POS + 2,
00456          
00457          endStatic_POS     = mapSettingsLen_POS + 4
00458       };

00729 // =======================================================================
00730 //                                     Implementation of inlined methods =
00731 
00732 // ---------- GfxFeatureMapReplyPacket ----------------
00733 
00734 inline uint32 
00735 GfxFeatureMapReplyPacket::getNbrRequestsToResend() const
00736 {
00737    return (readLong(NBR_REQUESTS_POS));
00738 }
00739 
00740 inline void
00741 GfxFeatureMapReplyPacket::incNbrRequestsToResend()
00742 {
00743    writeLong(NBR_REQUESTS_POS, getNbrRequestsToResend() + 1);
00744 }
00745 
00746 inline int
00747 GfxFeatureMapReplyPacket::getGfxStartPos() const
00748 {
00749    // The GfxData starts at MAP_ID_START_POS + mapids*8 + length copyright
00750    return MAP_ID_START_POS + getNbrRequestsToResend() * 8 + 
00751       readShort( LENGTH_COPYRIGHT_POS );
00752 }
00753 
00754 // ---------- GfxFeatureMapRequestPacket ----------------
00755 
00756 inline int
00757 GfxFeatureMapRequestPacket::incNbrNodeIDs()
00758 {
00759    uint32 nbrNodeIDs = getNbrNodeIDs();
00760    writeShort( nbrNodeIDs_POS, nbrNodeIDs + 1);
00761    mc2dbg8 << "   Increased nbr nodes to " << getNbrNodeIDs() << endl;
00762    return (getNodeIDPos(nbrNodeIDs));
00763 }
00764 
00765 inline int 
00766 GfxFeatureMapRequestPacket::getNodeIDPos(uint32 i) const
00767 {
00768    return (readLong( mapSettingsLen_POS ) + endStatic_POS + i * 4);
00769 }
00770 
00771 inline bool
00772 GfxFeatureMapRequestPacket::containsRoute() const 
00773 {
00774    return getNbrNodeIDs() > 0;
00775 }
